description:
Police chase Car driving 3D simulator free: Shoot the gangsters in crime city

Have you ever dreamed of becoming a cop? To be a Hero? Or to be real time humanity savior? YES!! Then get ready for this realist and hard job, here we are with a police game beyond your dreams, our game a police officer consisting of a top-secret mission game. In this game you have to chase the criminal cars and shoot the criminals at the spot to avoid any mishap and emergency in the city. In some level of the game you have to use sniper gun to precisely shoot the criminal to limited amount of time. As a cop you thunder through the streets of this fictional crime city as you try to chase down criminals as a law enforcement officer. This is something you never seen before in any chasing car games on mobile before!!! So fasten your seat belts to chase and shoot the criminals in the crime city

Features Police chase Car driving

Aim, Shoot and Take out Headshots
Smooth controls
Thrilling gameplay
Detailed 3D City environment with Dynamic moving traffic!
High quality graphics
Earn cash and points during police pursuits
Show your driving skills and don’t get shaking off
Customizable control methods (tilt, buttons, wheel)
iOS Optimization: runs perfectly on anything from the original iPad 1 to the latest 5th Generation widescreen devices.
